mapper.insert: insert into collection(user_id, subcategory_id, name, status_id, other_category, purchase_date, purchase_place, price, storage_location) values(#{user.no}, #{subcategory.no}, #{name}, #{status.no}, #{otherCategory}, #{purchaseDate}, #{purchasePlace}, #{price}, #{storageLocation})
mapper.select: select c.collection_id, c.name, sc.maincategory_id, mc.color, c.subcategory_id, c.other_category, c.status_id, cs.status_name, cp.photo_id, cp.filename, cp.origin_filename from collection c left join collection_status cs on c.status_id = cs.status_id left join collection_photo cp on c.collection_id = cp.collection_id left join subcategory sc on c.subcategory_id = sc.subcategory_id left join maincategory mc on sc.maincategory_id = mc.maincategory_id where c.is_deleted = 0 and c.user_id = #{no}
